mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (title, content, authorId, studyboardno, noticeNo, createdAt) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{authorId}, #{studyboardno}, #{noticeNo}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM notice WHERE studyboardno = #{studyboardno} ORDER BY createdAt ASC
SELECT count(*) AS total_count FROM notice WHERE studyboardno = #{studyboardno}
SELECT COALESCE(MAX(noticeNo), 0) FROM notice WHERE studyboardno = #{studyboardno}
SELECT role FROM studymember sm JOIN studyboard sb ON sm.studyboardno = sb.no WHERE memberId = #{memberId} and sm.studyboardno = #{studyboardno}
